products.title: Meadow Dove
products.metadescription: Meadow dove made to measure roller blind

products.title: Meadow Dove Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Meadow dove grey roller blind in grey. Made to measure from 15.13 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Add a chic touch of decoration to your windows and complement a modern scheme with this print of flora in cool grey and white tones. The meadow dove roller blind will bring both comfort and classic style to your space thanks to the graceful motif displayed on pollergen treated fabric.
 
 Product id: db-rbx2019 fabric colour: dove grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Meadow Dove Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Meadow dove grey electric roller blind in grey. Made to measure from 153.92 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The meadow dove electric roller blind will add tasteful decoration to your interior whilst providing a practical window covering for. The graceful motif of flora in cool grey and white tones will complement contemporary schemes or help to update a more traditional space. This blind benefits from many useful features such as pollergen treated fabric and remote electric control to bring ease and comfort to your day.
 
 Product id: db-erbx2019 fabric colour: dove grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes
